DOC.brief_title: Detection and/or Evaluation Dense Breast Abnormalities Using Tomosynthesis Digital Mammography
DOC.criteria: Females 30 year age old . Dense Breasts . Has undergone clinical two view mammogram diagnostic breast image evaluation . Suspicious palpable mass schedule biopsy . Pregnant lactating woman . Prior personal history breast cancer . Prior breast augmentation implant silicon injection . male patient . No two view mammogram part breast image evaluation . Breast density almost entirely fatty/scattered fibroglandular density .
